de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.scaling
Interface StaticScalingFunction

All Superinterfaces:
InspectionUtilFrequentlyScanned, Parameterizable, ScalingFunction
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClipScaling, GammaScaling, IdentityScaling, LinearScaling, MinusLogScaling
public interface StaticScalingFunction
extends ScalingFunction

Interface for Scaling functions that do NOT depend on analyzing the data set. But will always map x to the same f(x) (given the same parameters).

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from interface de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.scaling.ScalingFunction
getMax, getMin, getScaled
